summary: ~ Play as the Father of Legolas, King Thranduil ~
descriptionHtml:
Uploaded for the first-time, here\'s a save file with a Bosmer (Wood Elf) Thranduil. He has started of with Hadvar (Imperials) and just that (Level 1). I made this character to look like King Thranduil of the recently released The Hobbit movie, no mods on it, hope U like it. 

It is recommended to use the console command * player.setscale 1.1 * (default is 1) to look taller like the Lord of the Rings Wood Elves.

Mod used for the Mouse/Elk Mount: Like a Boss - New Mounts Mod

~ I\'d really like the Autumn Circlet he wears in movie, made by someone ~
~ It now is in the Mod Requests Forum area _ Any help appreciated ~
author: Falaran the Snow Prince
